description: This component file defines a Qwik component for a 'Next Steps' guidance interface, including instructional messages, user interaction handling with keyboard and button clicks, and styling via CSS modules.

methods.name: GETTING_STARTED_STEPS
methods.description: An array of step instructions objects with message and optional hint.

methods.name: default
